verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Lord, I lift my friend to You
I've done all that I know to do
I lift my friend to You.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Complicated circumstances have clouded his view
Lord, I lift my friend up to You.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: I fear that I won't have the words that he needs to hear.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: I pray for Your wisdom O God and a heart that's sincere

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: And Lord, I lift my friend up to You.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: Lord, I lift my friend to You.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: My best friend in the world I know, he means much more to You.

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: I want so much to help him but this is something He has to do.

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: Lord, I lift my friend up to You.

verse.name: c2a
verse.lines:
'Cause there's a way that seems so right to him,
but You know where that leads.

verse.name: c2b
verse.lines:
He's becoming a puppet of the world.
too blind to see the strings.

verse.name: c2c
verse.lines:
Lord, I lift my friend up to you.
My friend up to You.
